Daqinfo¶

application/models/daqinfo.php

class Daqinfo¶
This model queries the basic DAQ information.
This model requires explicitly loading offline database in advance
This model is meant to be used together with Ajax

Example usage in the controller:

<?php
function json_daq($run) {
    $this->load->database($this->session->userdata('database'));
    $this->Daqinfo->json_daq($run);
    // process the returned JSON data within javascript
}

Methods

json_daq($run)¶
Query the basic DAQ information
Internally calls LoadDaqInfo()
Returns:JSON data of the DAQ information
 {
 "active": "SAB-AD2",

 "SAB-AD1":{
     "FEE_prefix":"0_",
     "LTB_prefix":"",
     "FEEBoardVersion":"218760961",
     "FEECPLDVersion":"218696198",
     "LTBfirmwareVersion":"268837697"
     },
 // and daq info for all other detectors ...

"LTB-SAB-AD1":{
    "DAC_total_value":"40",
    "HSUM_trigger_threshold":"50",
    "LTB_triggerSource":"NHit"
    },
 // and LTB info for all other detectors ...

 "0_1":{"DACUniformVal":"750"},
 "0":{},
 "0_5":{"MaxHitPerTrigger":"3","DACUniformVal":"750"},
 // ...
 "0_17":{"MaxHitPerTrigger":"3","DACUniformVal":"750"},
 // and FEE setting for all other detectors ...
 }

Note

Following attributes and methods are meant to be used internally only.

Attributes

runNo¶
runType¶
base_table¶

an array of default DAQ settings, based on this run’s Schema-Base version

<?php
$base_table = array(
    array(
        'runType' => '',
        'className' => '',
        'name' => '',
        'intValue' => '',
        'stringValue' => '',
    ),
    // more settings ...
);
data_table¶

same structure as base_table, but only records changes, based on this run’s Schema-Data version

active_detector¶

name of the active detector. TODO: need to record multiple active detectors

Detector_table¶

a dictionary of detector DAQ settings

<?php
$Detector_table = array(
    'SAB-AD1' => array(
        'FEE_prefix' => '',
        'LTB_prefix' => '',
        'FEEBoardVersion' => '',
        'FEECPLDVersion' => '',
        'LTBfirmwareVersion' => '',
    ),
    // more detectors ...
);
LTB_table¶

a dictionary of LTB settings

<?php
$LTB_table = array(
    'LTB-SAB-AD1' => array(
        'HSUM_trigger_threshold' => '',
        'DAC_total_value' => '',
        'LTB_triggerSource' => '',
    ),
    // more detectors ...
);
FEE_table¶

a dictionary of FEE settings

<?php
$FEE_table = array(
    '0_1' => array(
        'MaxHitPerTrigger' => '',
        'DACUniformVal' => '',
    ),
    // more FEEs ...
);
triggerDict¶

a dictionary of trigger codes

<?php
var $triggerDict = array(
     'Unknown'   => 0,
     'Manual'    => 1,
     'External'  => 2,
     'Periodic'  => 4,
     'Reserved'  => 8,
     'Reserved'  => 16,
     'Reserved'  => 32,
     'Reserved'  => 64,
     'Reserved'  => 128,
     'NHit'      => 256,
     'Esum_ADC'  => 512,
     'Esum_High' => 1024,
     'Esum_Low'  => 2048,
     'Esum'      => 4096,
); // defined in LTB manual

Methods

LoadDaqInfo($run)¶
Query the basic DAQ information
Internally calls _LoadRawTable(), _ConstructDaqTable(), _LoadActiveDetector(), _LoadDetectorTable(), _LoadLTBTable(), _LoadFEETable(), _FinalizeTables()
_LoadRawTable($run, $version)¶

construct base_table or data_table

Parameters:$version – 'base' or 'data'
_ConstructDaqTable($run)¶
Initialize Detector_table, LTB_table, FEE_table
Detector_name hard-coded
FEE_prefix hard-coded
LTB_prefix hard-coded
FEE board hard-coded (5 - 17)
_LoadActiveDetector($row)¶
_LoadDetectorTable($row)¶
_LoadLTBTable($row)¶
_LoadFEETable($row)¶
_FinalizeTables()¶

Clean up the tables.

_GetTriggerTypeString($trigger)¶

Convert trigger code to a string based on triggerDict. Diffrent trigger types are joined by ‘ | ‘.
